about.description: Provides information about me and a way to get help

get.name: get
get.description: Displays the specified city and/or order alignment book

server.name: server
server.description: {{ .game }} Server name. If not filled, the guild server is used instead

set.name: set
set.description: Registers your alignment in the specified server alignment book

level.name: level
level.description: Alignment level between 0 and 100. Indicate 0 to unregister

server.name: server
server.description: {{ .game }} Server name. If not filled, the guild server is used instead

day.name: day
day.description: Provides the almanax of a specific day

date.name: date
date.description: Date in DD/MM/YYYY format. If not filled, the current day is used instead

resources.name: resources
resources.description: Provides the resources needed for a specific period

duration.name: duration
duration.description: Number of days desired (30 days maximum). If not filled, the duration is set to 7 days

effects.name: effects
effects.description: Provides the next almanax day with the desired effect

config.description: Permits to configure me: {{ .game }} server, Almanax, RSS feeds or tweets automatic sendings

get.name: get
get.description: Displays my current configuration to the Discord serveur

almanax.name: almanax
almanax.description: Enable automatic Almanax sending everyday at midnight

enabled.name: enabled
enabled.description: Enables or disables Almanax sending in the channel

channel.name: channel
channel.description: If not filled, the current channel is used instead

enabled.name: enabled
enabled.description: Enables or disables RSS feeds sending in the channel

feedtype.name: feed
feedtype.description: Feed type desired, provided by the official website

channel.name: channel
channel.description: If not filled, the current channel is used instead

server.name: server
server.description: Links the Discord server to a {{ .game }} server

channel.name: channel
channel.description: {{ .game }} server linked to the channel will be prior to the one linked to the Discord server

twitter.name: twitter
twitter.description: Enables automatic sending of tweets from {{ .game }} official account

enabled.name: enabled
enabled.description: Enables or disables tweets sending in the channel

channel.name: channel
channel.description: If not filled, the current channel is used instead

item.description: Provides items, mounts, pets, resources and pets

query.name: query
query.description: Wanted item; the more precise the description, the more relevant the search!

get.name: get
get.description: Displays the specified job craftsmen book

server.name: server
server.description: {{ .game }} Server name. If not filled, the guild server is used instead

set.name: set
set.description: Registers your job in the specified server craftsmen book

level.name: level
level.description: Job level between 0 and 200. Indicate 0 to unregister

server.name: server
server.description: {{ .game }} Server name. If not filled, the guild server is used instead

number.name: number
number.description: Desired map (between 1 and 50). If not filled, map is drawn at random

query.name: query
query.description: Wanted set; the more precise the description, the more relevant the search!
